MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY7 postcode area of Milton of Balgonie. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:45am due to an underground cable fault outside 6 Balfour Place and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:29am on Thursday, 18 February 2021
